Description:
Model
Brand: Jansicotek
Model: TJ-A114
Type: DisplayPort Cable
Color: Black


Details
Length: 3.3 ft.
Cable Length: 3.3 ft.
Connector Number: 1
Connect From: 1 x DisplayPort 2.0
Connect To: 1 x DisplayPort 2.0
Connector Detail: DisplayPort to DisplayPort 2.0 Cable 16K@60Hz
Terminal Gender: Male to Male
Specifications: DP2.0/Up to 80Gbps Bandwidth/Dynamic HDR/Display Stream Compression(DSC)/Forward Erroe Correction(FCE)

16K@60Hz(With DSC)/10K@60Hz/8K@60Hz/4K@165Hz/4K@144Hz(No Compression).

Durable and long lasting DP cable,Aluminum shell gold-plated DP connector, protecting against friction, Connecting without direction, You can choose any end to connect your input or display. 

DisplayPort 16k Cable provides no signal missing transmitting, 3D Visual Experience, supports up to 4K@165Hz refersh Rate, Ensure the smooth transmission of videos and images without delay, so that every frame is clearly visible.

Universal Compatibility, DP 2.0 Version backwards compatible with DP1.4,1.2 and so on, This DisplayPort Cable enable to connct from your DisplayPort Source Device to your 4K or 8K or Future 10K 16K DP Display, Enjoy the Ultra High Definition Ultimate Experience of the Big screen, fitting for PC Laptop as Source, DisplayPort HDTVs, Monitors, Projectors as Displays, Plug and Play.


Standards
Refresh Rate: 16K@60Hz(With DSC)/10K@60Hz/8K@60Hz/4K@165Hz/4K@144Hz(No Compression).


Features
Features: 1. DisplayPort copper cable, DisplayPort 2.0 cable, support Ultra 16K 8K 7680 * 4320 resolution, support compatible with 8K at 60Hz, 4K at 144Hz, UHD, HDR, provide ultra-high-definition video transmission experience and 3D visual effects, transmit simultaneous audio and video .

2. Refresh rate: 16K at 60 Hz (with DSC), 10K at 60Hz (no compression), 8K (no compression) at 60HZ, 4K (no compression) at 65HZ, 4K at 144 Hz (no compression).

3. Support eARC, HDCP, CEC, EDID, support dynamic HDR, display compressed DSC, forward error correction.

4. Brand new ultra-fast 80Gbps HDR 4:4:4 DP DisplayPort 2.0 cable 16K at 60Hz 10K at 60Hz 4K at 165Hz braided cable with gold-plated connector. Backward compatible with DP 1.4 / DP 1.2 for QLED TV game displays.
Label: Cable DisplayPort 2.0, 1m
